example.egtrans: 英文单词“deduct”（推理）起源于拉丁语。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 源自, 起源于, 来自, 从...中衍生

example.eg: The company derives from an idea the partners had when they were students.
example.egtrans: 公司采用了合伙人当学生时的想法。

example.eg: The workers derive the cocaine from the leaves of the coco plant.
example.egtrans: 工人们从可可树叶中提取出可卡因。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从...中取得, 从...中提取出

example.eg: Adam derives great satisfaction from writing poetry.
example.egtrans: 诗歌写作给予亚当非常大的满足感。

example.eg: Sherlock Holmes could derive accurate conclusions about a person from the smallest of clues.
example.egtrans: 夏洛克·福尔摩斯能够从最细微的线索推断出关于一个人的准确结论。
